concept.title: Filtering a Report by Additional Timeframes

conbody.p: After zooming into one timeframe as shown in the previous section, you can filter the report by an additional timeframe in the report filters area as shown below.

You can further drill down into the data by removing values. To remove the values click the labels displaying the values to the right of the chart. The removed text values are displayed at the bottom of the chart. For example, in the screenshot below the hits on the site http://www.slashdot.org are removed. The green bar in the chart is also removed and the selected label to the right of the chart is also greyed out. This results list at the bottom of the report no longer display items containing the hyperlink http://www.slashdot.org.Click a text area to display additional filters in the filter area of the report.
